response.original_title: Sinister Cinema: House of Hammer Volume 1
response.overview: Compilation of Hammer Film movie trailers from Sinister Cinema.  Includes trailers from:  Horror of Dracula (’58), The Mummy (’59), Brides of Dracula (’60), X, the Unknown (’56), Enemy from Space (’58), Hound of the Baskervilles (’59), The Gorgon (’64), Curse of the Mummy’s Tomb (’64), One Million Years, B.C. (’66), Five Million Years to Earth (’67), The Devil’s Bride (’68), Dracula has Risen from the Grave (’68), Frankenstein Must be Destroyed (’69), Taste the Blood of Dracula (’70), The Vampire Lovers (’70), Scars of Dracula (’70), Horror of Frankenstein (’70), Countess Dracula (’71), Vampire Circus (’72), Lust for a Vampire (’71), Dr. Jekyll and Sister Hyde (’71), Twins of Evil (’71), Dracula, A.D., 1972 (’72), Frankenstein and the Monster from Hell (’73).
response.title: Sinister Cinema: House of Hammer Volume 1
